root.name: Hero Quest
root.description: Hero Quest is a turn-based fantasy role playing game, based on the popular board game of the same name. The game is played from an isometric view. You choose from 4 characters, a dwarf, a barbarian, an elf, and a wizard. Each of the characters have their own strengths and weaknesses. There are fourteen levels and every character starts in his own corner of the map. Every round you will have a dice roll which will decide how many move and action points you will get. These points are spent to move, fight monsters, and cast spells.Â You can also find potions and treasures around the map which can be traded at the shop after each level.
